profileAlternative.name: Amit Eshet
profileAlternative.headline: DBA (Oracle & SQL Server) at TAMA
profileAlternative.summary:
• 10+ years Oracle and SQL Server DBA
• Vast experience in administration and maintenance of large number of distributed
databases both Oracle and SQL Server
• Implementation and administration of SOA Suite(10g, 11g), Oracle applications, OEM 12c
• Oracle Database upgrades: 9i 32bit --> 10g 64bit --> 11R2 64bit
• SQL Server upgrades: sql2000 --> sql2008 --> sql2012
• Implement SQL Server Cluster configuration
• SQL Server replication over remote (overseas) servers (merge and transactional)

And much more (perfomance tunning, backup/recovery methods, automatic clonning, SSIS , SSRS)...
